channel.title: Comments on: Chicken and Leek Risotto – Cooking Class 9

item.title: By: Andrea
item.dc:creator: Andrea
item.description: I loved this recipe. It was easy to make and quite delicious. I would be lovely also without the chicken. Well done!
item.content:encoded: I loved this recipe. It was easy to make and quite delicious. I would be lovely also without the chicken. Well done!

item.title: By: Melanie
item.dc:creator: Melanie
item.description:
Hi Anita - Natalia has put me on to your website. LOVE IT!
I am wondering why - with the risotto - you cover the baking dish with foil, and not just put a lid on it? I put a lid on mine last night and it worked "OK"...but I probably over cooked it....
item.content:encoded:
Hi Anita – Natalia has put me on to your website. LOVE IT!

I am wondering why – with the risotto – you cover the baking dish with foil, and not just put a lid on it? I put a lid on mine last night and it worked “OK”…but I probably over cooked it….

item.title: By: Juliana
item.dc:creator: Juliana
item.description: Oh! This risotto looks absolutely delicious...leek and chicken, will definitely try it!
item.content:encoded: Oh! This risotto looks absolutely delicious…leek and chicken, will definitely try it!

item.title: By: Sophia
item.dc:creator: Sophia
item.description: A risotto?! I would have been jumpin up and down with joy! I'd love to learn to make this, I've always wanted to! Awesome experience for you! :D
item.content:encoded: A risotto?! I would have been jumpin up and down with joy! I’d love to learn to make this, I’ve always wanted to! Awesome experience for you! ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Sounds like a good recipe- easy to make and I love all the ingredients. Much as I like risotto, it's a pain to make; this will be a pleasure to try. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Sounds like a good recipe- easy to make and I love all the ingredients. Much as I like risotto, it’s a pain to make; this will be a pleasure to try. Thanks!

item.title: By: Rosa
item.dc:creator: Rosa
item.description:
A wonderful combo! Your risotto must taste great!
Cheers,
Rosa
item.content:encoded:
A wonderful combo! Your risotto must taste great!

Cheers,

Rosa

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: oh yum, i love that cheese layer in the second last photo. Risottos are great for reheated lunches! And what an easy way of cooking, no more standing and stirring till your arm falls off!
item.content:encoded: oh yum, i love that cheese layer in the second last photo. Risottos are great for reheated lunches! And what an easy way of cooking, no more standing and stirring till your arm falls off!

item.title: By: Katherine
item.dc:creator: Katherine
item.description: I have never tried to make Baked Risotto. I am going to try this recipe. It looks so yummy..
item.content:encoded: I have never tried to make Baked Risotto. I am going to try this recipe. It looks so yummy..

item.title: By: Belle@OohLook
item.dc:creator: Belle@OohLook
item.description: A baked risotto is so much easier than the other, stirring method! I am not one to complain, though, as I use pre-cooked rice that you just dump into a pan with the other ingredients. Your recipe sounds delicious, so I will definitely give it a go.
item.content:encoded: A baked risotto is so much easier than the other, stirring method! I am not one to complain, though, as I use pre-cooked rice that you just dump into a pan with the other ingredients. Your recipe sounds delicious, so I will definitely give it a go.

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: I love the way you can cook it in the oven - it would save so much stirring! I like risotto with chunks of things, so chicken, leek and peas would be great.
item.content:encoded: I love the way you can cook it in the oven – it would save so much stirring! I like risotto with chunks of things, so chicken, leek and peas would be great.
